General.Name: Waberer's International Nyrt
General.Description: Waberer's International Nyrt. provides full truckload (FTL) transportation services in Europe. The company operates through three segments: International Transportation, Regional Contract Logistics, and insurance. Its activities include long-haul international transport of standard pallet goods, domestic transportation, and storage and distribution of dry and refrigerated goods, as well as international brokerage. The company also provides international FTL transportation and freight forwarding, and collective transportation services; LTL transportation services; warehousing, in-house logistics, and vehicle repair services to third parties; cargo services; and non-life insurance products, including compulsory motor third party liability insurance, CASCO, CMR and professional indemnity insurance. In addition, it engages in the property letting, vehicle trade, and temporary agency. The company was founded in 1948 and is headquartered in Budapest, Hungary.

3.Name: Mr. Bence  Nyilasy
